attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the days,weeks and years after the Hillsborough diaster Kenny Dalglish conducted himself with great respect and was a rock to the families of the dead. This has never been acknowledge outside of liverpool and it's about time it did.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
